name: Incapacitating Strike
description: Ravage an enemy with a swift strike, dealing 3718 Disease Damage and causing them to take 20% more damage from your attacks for 6 seconds.  If cast with 120 or more Ultimate, the enemy is stunned for 3 seconds.  While slotted you gain Reave, which restores 100 Magicka and Stamina when you deal damage with a Light or Heavy Attack on an enemy with a negative effect active on them.
effectLines: Deals Disease Damage. If cast with higher Ultimate, stuns the target.  While slotted, your Light and Heavy Attacks restore resources if the enemy has a negative effect active.
